value.title: BI Leader Qlik Goes AI, Acquires AutoML Provider Big Squid
value.excerpt: Qlik, a BI and data integration leader, announced the acquisition of Big Squid and its no-code automated machine learning (AutoML) software platform. This acquisition will expand Qlik’s existing SaaS roadmap and bring new capabilities to the platform.
